data.name: Fractal Fly - Undersea Forest
data.detailed_description:
An additional fractal to explore in Fractal Fly!

Like you are scuba diving in the sea of a foreign planet.
Anemones, algae all around you, with a myriad of colors.
And when you morph the landscape you will be even more surrounded by them, all blossom around you.

After acquiring this DLC, you'll be able to wander freely in this fractal and explore it at your will, as many times and as long as you want.
And remember that before to acquire it, you can preview it directly into Fractal Fly app!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least NVidia GTX 970 or equivalent for VR mode
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works on screen as well as with a VR headset
